> Unit testing gives you confidence in your objects. Integration
> testing gives you confidence in the interaction between your objects.

Doesn't integration testing give you both confidence in the interaction
between your objects and confidence in your objects?

Mike Bresnahan
subject: Re: Unit Testing vs Integration Testing
